long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
xPad — Decentralized Fundraising Reimagined for Social Media

xPad is a revolutionary launchpad that allows users to launch, fund, and support projects directly on X (formerly Twitter). By integrating blockchain technology, xPad simplifies decentralized fundraising, making it more accessible and transparent without requiring token holdings.

Key Features:

- Engagement-Based IXOs: Participate in projects based on your activity on X — no token holdings required.
- Weighted Lottery System: Higher social engagement means better chances of receiving allocations in fundraising rounds.
- xDrop Airdrops: Earn tokens by completing tasks or interacting with projects on X.

Through xPad, you can seamlessly join decentralized fundraising using your X account. Participation is driven by social engagement, with blockchain securing all interactions to ensure full transparency. Whether supporting projects or earning tokens through xDrops, xPad keeps everything on-platform, making it easy to participate in the evolving world of decentralized projects.
